rejectionReason.name: Although you may be suitable for the funding that we offer, the competition for places was such that we were not able to progress your application on this occasion.
Although you may be suitable for your preferred course of study, the competition for places was such that we were unable to progress your application on this occasion.
At the present time, we are unable to a supervisor to support you in your preferred course of study.
At the present time, we are unable to allocate a supervisor to support you in your preferred course of study.
We are no longer able to offer your preferred course of study.
We are unable to form a judgement on your suitability based upon the information that you have supplied in your application.
You failed to present for interview as arranged.
You have informed us that you no longer wish to be considered.
Your application was not considered eligible because the research that you intend to conduct is not within the remit of our funding.
Your application was not considered eligible because you have not been admitted to your chosen study institution.
Your application was not considered eligible because your student fee status has been determined to be overseas. This means that we are not able to award you with funding.

Your application was not considered eligible. This will be because: (a) your application for study at your chosen institution was unsuccessful; (b) your fee status has been determined as Overseas, and/or; (c) Your research falls outside or our remit.
Your qualifications and experience are not appropriate for your preferred course of study.
Your qualifications and experience are not sufficient to satisfy the entrance requirements for our organisation.
